name: SANJAY KALIKA
tweet: Fact Of The Day  When is Ronald McDonald not Ronald McDonald? When he is Donald McDonald. In Japan, McDonald’s red-haired clown is known as Donald McDonald. The Japanese do not have a clear ‘r’ sound in their language. To make it easier for everyone, the first name was changed.

name: pixie/あおいちゃん💕🕊
tweet: @thintinmints In Japan, McDonald’s has a policy called “doors are always open.” This means that homeless people can use a McDonalds to “live in”! They even get the name “McRefugees”

name: Stephen Wells
tweet: One of the most horrifying things about japan is that the McDonald’s clown is not called Ronald McDonald. No. In japan he’s called Donald McDonald and every time I see the name a little bit of blood leaks from my ear

name: The Endblock🌽 (Commissions Open)
tweet: Interesting fact: Ronald Mcdonald was renamed in Japan to be easier to pronounce for native Japanese speakers. In Japan, he's known as Donald Mcdonald, which is honestly a better name.

name: Barry Nishizawa
tweet: Team, I just remembered what I wanted to tell you the other day.  Japan hack:   Ronald McDonald is called DONALD MCDONALD in Japan.  Same guy. Different name. Still looks like a serial killer.  This might help when yelling “あっち行け！ドナルド！” to ward off any attacks.
